title: Ultimate Beachfront 3 Bedroom Villa for Sale in Ban Makham
description:
Key Features
•	Complex of 7 luxury 3 bedroom villas
•	Multi award-winning reliable developer
•	Located on pristine Laem Noi beach
•	Next to Four Seasons Resort Samui
•	Secure gated & guarded community
•	Contemporary, open-plan modern living
•	Sleek, elegant and functional design
•	Expansive terraces, sofa lounge & Sala
•	Spectacular ocean and sunset views
•	Mineral treated infinity-edge pool
•	Designer furniture (Pedrali, Dedon)
•	Western kitchen appliances
•	Smart Home System - via iPhone/iPad
•	6 camera CCTV - remote access
•	Terrazzo bath tub & rain shower
•	AXOR Urquiola Bathroom fittings
•	Full concierge service available
•	Facility management services
•	350-500 sqm living space
•	Freehold or leasehold options
